mapper.select: select t2.*, fee_key.name as fee_key_name from ( select fv.id, fv.name, fv.unit, fv.fee_key_id from (select * from apartment_fee_value afv where afv.apartment_id=#{id} and afv.is_deleted = 0) t1 left join fee_value fv on t1.fee_value_id = fv.id where fv.is_deleted=0 ) t2 LEFT JOIN fee_key on t2.fee_key_id=fee_key.id where fee_key.is_deleted=0;
